function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of awareness and training on hygiene and sanitation protocols for edge and fog computing infrastructure","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on cloud and iot for data processing and communication in edge and fog computing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through wearable devices and environmental sensors in the home hospitalization system.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and education about the use of iot-based devices and mobile applications in the context of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in implementing cost-effective sensing units for low-income patients.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wearable sensors may not accurately detect airborne pathogens, leading to false sense of security.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate privacy measures for sharing covid-19 electronic medical records cemrs could result in breaches and misuse of sensitive information.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate estimation of outdoor environment occupancy and density may lead to ineffective crowd management and disease transmission control.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of validation for system used for early diagnosis of covid-19 in students","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient focus on post-covid-19-infection effects on patients","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relying on incomplete symptom screening for covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective contact tracing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of empirical studies evaluating the effectiveness of digital contact tracing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative impact on mental health due to the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using consumer-grade wearables to measure students’ anxiety and depression may lead to data privacy and security risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in e-learning and use of iot in smart learning increases the risk of cyber attacks and data breaches.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential barriers to wearables’ usage in healthcare due to prototype stages and user acceptance, security, ethics, and big data concerns.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited validation studies for wearables at the clinical level","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Security breach risk in wearable devices","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Barriers to innovation due to regulatory procedures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of technological awareness among the elderly population","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data security and patient confidentiality concerns","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Legal, regulatory, and policy challenges","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adoption of available technology in health systems","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges related to the design trade-offs, improved sensors, power, size, computation algorithms, and security","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of multifunctional capabilities in wearables","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mixed evidence and ongoing debate about the relationship between temperature and the spread of covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible transmission of sars-cov-2 across countries through air travel","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Health expenditure as a proxy for differences in countries’ commitment to population health","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential misinformation on covid-19 transmission and risk factors related to climate and geography","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unsubstantiated conclusions on the impact of heat and sunlight on sars-cov-2 transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relying on seasonal variations to contain sars-cov-2 spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Analysis based on covid-19 cases per million inhabitants and country’s latitude could lead to oversimplified conclusions about disease propagation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to control for differential testing intensity may skew the analysis of disease propagation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reporting biases and incomplete coverage of testing approaches","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Factors such as health infrastructure, socioeconomic background, and health supplies affecting the spread of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to assess seasonal patterns and mutated versions of sars-cov-2","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate testing intensity can lead to underreporting of covid-19 cases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited health expenditure may result in insufficient healthcare resources during a pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global crises such as the covid-19 pandemic and economic depression increase susceptibility to contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nation-wide quarantines and lockdowns lead to economic impacts and social readjustment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the interaction with home energy management systems in a pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the use of hems technologies and the interaction with end-users","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reluctance of residents to adopt hems due to associated costs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of willingness to pay for hems leading to slower market growth","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceived lack of usefulness of technology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Technology anxiety","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability of renters to make decisions on home improvements","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of internet-based survey data with potential for biased responses due to self-selection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survey focused on new york metropolitan area, limiting generalizability to other regions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
